claim: The story of Betsy Ross designing the first American flag is likely apocryphal.

supporting.text: No contemporaneous evidence exists to support the claim that Betsy Ross designed the first American flag.

attacks.text: No contemporaneous evidence exists to support the claim that Betsy Ross designed the first American flag.
